channel.title: Veraset on Development Data Partnership
channel.description: Recent content in Veraset on Development Data Partnership

item.title: Improving public space and market design during COVID-19
item.description: Lima’s Central Market has always been one of the busiest and liveliest in Lima, Peru. Before the pandemic, some hundreds of people gathered there to buy and sell groceries, clothes, electronics–you name it.

item.title: How to Find Population Movement Data for Your Country: The Mobile Location Data Inventory
item.description: As the COVID-19 pandemic continues, so have measures to mitigate its spread. Physical distancing and movement restrictions – such as school and workplace closures, public event cancellations, stay-at-home orders, and international and domestic travel bans – vary considerably across countries.
